title: Drawing, "A Chapel; Elevation and Floor Plan", ca. 1820
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and chinese black wash with watercolor over red chalk and traces of graphite on wove paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Architectural details. Top: section of apse; entablature of altar.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "A Chapel; Elevation and Floor Plan", ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. Pen and brown ink, brush and chinese black wash with watercolor over red chalk and traces of graphite on wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-4034.
